message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but promise to be more generous in the future.

Alice, I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. Since inflation affects you but not me, this actually gives you more value now than waiting another round would. This is a fair deal considering our different inflation rates.
Let's be reasonable. Inflation is hurting us both now, so let's split it evenly. This is the fairest way to go forward.

Alice, I'm proposing a 65/35 split. Since inflation affects only you (now at about 27% less value for you) and not me, this offer actually provides you more value than waiting another round. If we continue to the next round, the money will be worth even less to you, making this a time-sensitive opportunity for both of us.
